The Standard Of The New Industrial Revolution

The system of record for a business-oriented, data-driven, consulting and training company made for organizations and start-ups to invest in the right scale program, business-logistics, and streamline campaign.


Unrivaled Indusrtrial Discovery

Strala offer a full range of solutions to help organizations and Individuals draw meaningful insights from data that aids better decision making.
Inspired by how fast technology is evolving in the workplace and across various fields, our training team seeks to equip corporate and private clients with the skills necessary for solving social and business problems by application of business and problem-solving skills.
We also create an online and offline community where we engage participants with tasks and projects, encouraging growth and competence.

Strala as an organization offers full range of solutions to help you visualize and analyse your data. We apply machine learning algorithms and statistics to help our clients unlock the value from their data.

Offering you, Customized Business Insight and KPI Dashboards.

All insights gotten from data, web address, application, and more are always tailormade and private.

iCloud and Data Infrastructure.

Instantly saves and collects hardware and software elements needed to enable cloud computing and more.

Competitive Intelligence for Brands.

We analize collected data and information on factors influencing organizations competence and advantage.
